metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Talk to Civilian - S_LOW_CountingHouse_Civilian_06 120f4e97-f519-4d1d-8537-70414eef6450 - (-121; 10; -232)

0.speaker: Brid Hunley
0.text: I heard about Stelmane this morning. Word of advice - when dukes start dropping like that, get your coin and get out of the city.

1.speaker: Brid Hunley
1.text: This will be my third loan attempt. Waukeen be with me...
